title: Calin Georgescu arrested in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Calin Georgescu is arrested between December 5, and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the arresting government and law enforcement, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

predictions.justification: The articles reveal escalating legal pressure on Calin Georgescu’s associates (e.g., financier Bogdan Peschir, security figure Horatiu Potra) and formal investigations into electoral fraud, cybercrimes, and foreign interference linked to his campaign. Key risk factors include: (1) Prosecutors have seized $7M in illicit campaign funds and tied Georgescu to Potra’s paramilitary group (which planned armed protests); (2) DIICOT and the Prosecutor’s Office are actively pursuing charges for electoral crimes and cyberattacks; (3) Georgescu’s public threats against Constitutional Court judges could trigger charges of intimidation. However, no direct evidence yet ties Georgescu to prosecutable offenses, and his associates (e.g., Potra) have avoided preventive arrest. The 15% base rate rises moderately due to the cascading legal risks but remains constrained by the lack of immediate arrest warrants targeting Georgescu himself.
